tool_description: IP Location Info service is a powerful tool designed to transform IP addresses into precise geographical locations. Whether you need to pinpoint the location of website visitors
name: IP Location Info
title: IP Location Info

api_list.name: IP to Location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-location-info.p.rapidapi.com/8.8.8.8"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-location-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-location-info.p.rapidapi.com/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-location-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
